trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of filter to use when routing messages.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tipo de filtro a ser usado ao rotear mensagens.

trans-unit.source: Use <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter" /> to filter on an action.
trans-unit.target: Use <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter" /> para filtrar em uma ação.

trans-unit.source: Use <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.StrictAndMessageFilter" /> to filter on two message filters, ANDed together.
trans-unit.target: Use <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.StrictAndMessageFilter" /> para filtrar em dois filtros de mensagem, ANDed juntos.
Use um filtro definido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Use <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> with <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter.IncludeHostNameInComparison" /> set to **false** to filter on the address.
trans-unit.target: Use <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> com <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter.IncludeHostNameInComparison" /> definida como **false** para filtrar no endereço.

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointNameMessageFilter" /> to filter on the name of the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Use o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointNameMessageFilter" /> para filtrar no nome do ponto de extremidade de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchAllMessageFilter" /> to match all messages.
trans-unit.target: Use o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchAllMessageFilter" /> para corresponder todas as mensagens.

trans-unit.source: Use <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.PrefixEndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> with <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.PrefixEndpointAddressMessageFilter.IncludeHostNameInComparison" /> set to **false** to filter on the address using longest prefix matching.
trans-unit.target: Use <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.PrefixEndpointAddressMessageFilter" /> com <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.PrefixEndpointAddressMessageFilter.IncludeHostNameInComparison" /> definido como **false** para filtrar o endereço usando a correspondência de prefixo mais longo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" /> to filter on an XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: Use o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageFilter" /> para filtrar em uma expressão XPath.
